entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
